venue.name: Outside Boylston T Stop on the Common

item.description:
Join NetSAP - Boston for a refreshing morning hike to the lovely Blue Hills.

Meet at the Boylston T stop at 9 AM, cars will leave at approximately 9:30 AM.

We anticipate about a 2 hour hike (9:30AM - 11:30AM).

Please bring plenty of water, and snacks, and a jacket as it may be slightly chilly.

We will be carpooling, so please rsvp as soon as possible to Andy, andy@netsapboston.org.
item.name: NetSAP Hike to Blue Hills Reservation
